title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 1 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Sep 1 2021
description:
Texas becomes first state to ban abortion once heartbeat detected, the left panics. Biden administration's spin is the celebration of the evacuation. The White House hopes we can all forget Afghanistan (and the press will help). Twenty-four California high school students were left behind in Afghanistan. Clay: "I'm surprised this isn't a bigger story, in terms of the media attention." With his trademark on-target sarcasm Buck asked: "No resignations. Because how could you resign, over a catastrophic success?"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
